title: Castle Point Anime Convention 2016
desc: There are no ID or age requirements for admittance CPAC. However, children under the age of 10 must be accompanied by another individual over the age of 16 at all times. (Also, children under the age of 8 do not need to purchase a badge, and will receive a free one from registration.) ? Parking is very limited in Hoboken, but there are a number of municipal garages that can be used. Otherwise, we strongly recommend using public transport to get to the event, of which there is plenty.? ? CPAC has a very strict policy on weapons, implemented for the safety of our attendees and volunteers. See our   for the full story.
